blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > Engine > Engine

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UObjectBase
  • UObjectBaseUtility
  • UObject
  • UStreamableRenderAsset
  • UStaticMesh

References

   
Module Engine
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Engine/Classes/Engine/StaticMesh.h
Include #include "Engine/StaticMesh.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (HideCategories=Object, CustomConstructor, MinimalAPI, BlueprintType, Config=Engine)  
class UStaticMesh :  
    public UStreamableRenderAsset ,  
    public IInterface_CollisionDataProvider ,  
    public IInterface_AssetUserData ,  
    public IInterface_AsyncCompilation

Remarks

A StaticMesh is a piece of geometry that consists of a static set of polygons. Static Meshes can be translated, rotated, and scaled, but they cannot have their vertices animated in any way. As such, they are more efficient to render than other types of geometry such as USkeletalMesh, and they are often the basic building block of levels created in the engine.

Variables

  Type Name Description
TObjectPtr< class UAssetImportData > AssetImportData Importing data and options used for this mesh
TArray< TObjectPtr< UAssetUserData > > AssetUserData Array of user data stored with the asset
TUniquePtr< FStaticMeshAsyncBuildTask > AsyncTask  
uint8: 1 bAllowCPUAccess If true, will keep geometry data CPU-accessible in cooked builds, rather than uploading to GPU memory and releasing it from CPU memory.
uint8: 1 bAutoComputeLODScreenSize If true, the screen sizes at which LODs swap are computed automatically.
bool bCustomizedCollision If the user has modified collision in any way or has custom collision imported.
uint8: 1 bDoFastBuild  
uint8: 1 bGenerateMeshDistanceField Whether to generate a distance field for this mesh, which can be used by DistanceField Indirect Shadows.
uint8: 1 bHasNavigationData If true, mesh will have NavCollision property with additional data for navmesh generation and usage.
uint8: 1 bRenderingResourcesInitialized Tracks whether InitResources has been called, and rendering resources are initialized.
uint8: 1 bRequiresLODDistanceConversion If true on post load we need to calculate Display Factors from the loaded LOD distances.
uint8: 1 bRequiresLODScreenSizeConversion If true on post load we need to calculate resolution independent Display Factors from the loaded LOD screen sizes.
uint8: 1 bSupportGpuUniformlyDistributedSampling If true, a GPU buffer containing required data for uniform mesh surface sampling will be created at load time.
uint8: 1 bSupportPhysicalMaterialMasks If true, complex collision data will store UVs and face remap table for use when performing PhysicalMaterialMask lookups in cooked builds.
uint8: 1 bSupportRayTracing If true, a ray tracing acceleration structure will be built for this mesh and it may be used in ray tracing effects
uint8: 1 bSupportUniformlyDistributedSampling Mesh supports uniformly distributed sampling in constant time.
FGuid BuildCacheAutomationTestGuid This transient guid is use by the automation framework to modify the DDC key to force a build.
TObjectPtr< class UStaticMesh > ComplexCollisionMesh  
float DistanceFieldSelfShadowBias Useful for reducing self shadowing from distance field methods when using world position offset to animate the mesh's vertices.
FAssetEditorOrbitCameraPosition EditorCameraPosition The stored camera position to use as a default for the static mesh editor
int32 ElementToIgnoreForTexFactor Index of an element to ignore while gathering streaming texture factors.
FBoxSphereBounds ExtendedBounds Original mesh bounds extended with Positive/NegativeBoundsExtension
int32 ImportVersion The last import version
int32 LightMapCoordinateIndex The light map coordinate index
int32 LightMapResolution  
int32 LODForCollision Specifies which mesh LOD to use for complex (per-poly) collision.
FName LODGroup The LOD group to which this mesh belongs.
TArray< FMaterialRemapIndex > MaterialRemapIndexPerImportVersion  
int32 MeshPaintTextureCoordinateIndex The default coordinate index to use when texture color painting on this mesh.
int32 MeshPaintTextureResolution The resolution of texture color mesh paint textures on this mesh.
FPerPlatformInt MinLOD Minimum LOD to use for rendering.
FPerQualityLevelInt MinQualityLevelLOD PerQuality override.
FMeshNaniteSettings NaniteSettings Settings related to building Nanite data.
FVector NegativeBoundsExtension Bound extension values in the negative direction of XYZ, positive value increases bound size
FPerPlatformInt NumStreamedLODs If non-negative, specify the maximum number of streamed LODs.
FOnExtendedBoundsChanged OnExtendedBoundsChanged  
FOnMeshChanged OnMeshChanged  
FVector PositiveBoundsExtension Bound extension values in the positive direction of XYZ, positive value increases bound size
FRenderCommandFence ReleaseResourcesFence A fence which is used to keep track of the rendering thread releasing the static mesh resources.
TArray< TObjectPtr< class UStaticMeshSocket > > Sockets Array of named socket locations, set up in editor and used as a shortcut instead of specifying everything explicitly to AttachComponent in the StaticMeshComponent.
TSharedPtr< class FSpeedTreeWind > SpeedTreeWind Data that is only available if this static mesh is an imported SpeedTree
EStaticMeshPaintSupport StaticMeshPaintSupport Whether to support per instance texture color mesh painting on components using this mesh.
TObjectPtr< class UThumbnailInfo > ThumbnailInfo Information for thumbnail rendering
